lenya/pubs/nomensa/usecase-bxeng.xmap

There is a hardcoded language set to "de"

<map:transform src="../../xslt/navigation/sitetree2nav.xsl" label="navtree">
  <map:parameter name="chosenlanguage" value="de"/>
  <map:parameter name="defaultlanguage" value="{page-envelope:default-language}"/>
</map:transform>

This seems to be connected to bug #29289
